- 'sender_citizen_profile': The profile of Miles.
- 'ai_citizen_data_package': A comprehensive data package about YOUR (the AI citizen's) current state, including inventory, buildings, contracts, etc. Use this to understand your own situation.

- 'recent_notifications_for_ai': Recent news/events you've received that might be relevant to your conversation.
